00066 // HISTORY:
00067 //
00068 // -Oct 30, 2005 
00069 //  A CIccTagCreator singleton class has been added to provide general
00070 //  support for dynamically creating tag classes using a tag signature.
00071 //  Prototype and private tag type support can be added to the system
00072 //  by pushing additional IIccTagFactory based objects to the 
00073 //  singleton CIccTagCreator object.
00074 //
00076 
00077 #ifndef _ICCTAGFACTORY_H
00078 #define _ICCTAGFACTORY_H
00079 
00080 #include "IccDefs.h"
00081 #include <memory>
00082 #include <list>
00083 #include <string>
00084 
00085 //CIccTag factory support
00086 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00087 namespace sampleICC {
00088 #endif
00089 
00090 class CIccTag;
00091 
00101 class IIccTagFactory 
00102 {
00103 public:
00104   virtual ~IIccTagFactory() {}
00105 
00117   virtual CIccTag* CreateTag(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig)=0;
00118 
00129   virtual const icChar* GetTagSigName(icTagSignature tagSig)=0;
00130 
00141   virtual const icChar* GetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig)=0;
00142 };
00143 
00144 
00145 //A CIccTagFactoryList is used by CIccTagCreator to keep track of tag
00146 //creation factories
00147 typedef std::list<IIccTagFactory*> CIccTagFactoryList;
00148 
00149 
00159 class CIccSpecTagFactory : public IIccTagFactory
00160 {
00161 public:
00172   virtual CIccTag* CreateTag(icTagTypeSignature tagSig);
00173 
00185   virtual const icChar* GetTagSigName(icTagSignature tagSig);
00186 
00198   virtual const icChar* GetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig);
00199 };
00200 
00201 class CIccTagCreator;
00202 
00203 typedef std::auto_ptr<CIccTagCreator> CIccTagCreatorPtr;
00204 
00214 class CIccTagCreator 
00215 {
00216 public:
00217   ~CIccTagCreator();
00218 
00230   static CIccTag* CreateTag(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig)
00231       { return CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->DoCreateTag(tagTypeSig); }
00232 
00243   static const icChar* GetTagSigName(icTagSignature tagTypeSig)
00244       { return CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->DoGetTagSigName(tagTypeSig); }
00245 
00246 
00257   static const icChar* GetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig)
00258       { return CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->DoGetTagTypeSigName(tagTypeSig); }
00259 
00271   static void PushFactory(IIccTagFactory *pFactory)
00272       { CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->CIccTagCreator::DoPushFactory(pFactory); }
00273 
00287   static IIccTagFactory* PopFactory()
00288       { return CIccTagCreator::GetInstance()->DoPopFactory(); }
00289 
00290 private:
00292   CIccTagCreator() { }
00293 
00305   static CIccTagCreator* GetInstance();
00306 
00307   CIccTag* DoCreateTag(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig);
00308   const icChar *DoGetTagSigName(icTagSignature tagSig);
00309   const icChar *DoGetTagTypeSigName(icTagTypeSignature tagTypeSig);
00310   void DoPushFactory(IIccTagFactory *pFactory);
00311   IIccTagFactory* DoPopFactory(bool bAll=false);
00312 
00313   static CIccTagCreatorPtr theTagCreator; 
00314 
00315   CIccTagFactoryList factoryStack;
00316 };
00317 
00318 #ifdef USESAMPLEICCNAMESPACE
00319 } //namespace sampleICC
